description: A massive island-sized ship ruled by Gecko Moria and the Thriller Bark Pirates. It serves as both a pirate ship and a zombie-creating facility where Moria and Dr. Hogback create their undead army.

keyEvents.title: Brook Defeats Tararan
keyEvents.description: Brook defeats the giant spider-monkey zombie Tararan using his sword technique combined with salt purification.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates that the Straw Hats are learning how to combat the zombie threat effectively.

keyEvents.title: Zombie Mechanics Explained
keyEvents.description: Brook reveals detailed information about how Thriller Bark's zombies are created through Moria's shadow-stealing powers and Hogback's medical expertise.
keyEvents.significance: Provides crucial understanding of how Thriller Bark operates as a zombie-creation facility.

description: The private chamber of Gecko Moria located within Thriller Bark. This is where Moria performs his shadow-stealing operations and where the Mysterious Four gather. The room is equipped with large light sources to cast clear shadows for extraction.

keyEvents.title: The Mysterious Four Gather
keyEvents.description: The four leaders of Thriller Bark meet in Moria's chamber to discuss their plans while the hidden Straw Hats observe.
keyEvents.significance: First proper view of Moria's personal chamber where he conducts his most important operations.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Captured
keyEvents.description: Luffy is bound by spider webs and suspended in the chamber, with a large light source positioned to cast his shadow clearly for extraction.
keyEvents.significance: The chamber serves as the setting for one of the arc's most critical events.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Shadow Stolen
keyEvents.description: In his chamber, Moria uses his Kage Giri technique to cut and steal Luffy's shadow, leaving the Straw Hat captain unconscious.
keyEvents.significance: This location becomes the site of the arc's central crisis - the theft of the protagonist's shadow.
